docs.lead_paragraph: Philadelphia Mayor-elect Jim Kenney bristles at the label "progressive."

headline.main: Philadelphia's 99th Mayor Says He's Fair, Not 'Progressive'
headline.print_headline: Philadelphia's 99th Mayor Says He's Fair, Not 'Progressive'

docs.snippet: Philadelphia Mayor-elect Jim Kenney bristles at the label "progressive."

docs.lead_paragraph: Preventing violence from depriving millions of children in Iraq of education and decent healthcare is a key humanitarian priority for the country in 2016, a senior U.N. official said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Iraq Risks Losing Generation Due to Lack of Schools, Healthcare: UNICEF
headline.print_headline: Iraq Risks Losing Generation Due to Lack of Schools, Healthcare: UNICEF

docs.snippet: Preventing violence from depriving millions of children in Iraq of education and decent healthcare is a key humanitarian priority for the country in 2016, a senior U.N. official said on Wednesday.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Nevada judge gave a Reno hospital the go-ahead Tuesday to conduct brain wave tests on a 20-year-old woman who has been on life-support since April, but the judge indicated she won't rule until at least Jan. 22 on the crucial question of life or death.

headline.main: Judge OKs Brain Tests in Reno End-Of-Life Case
headline.print_headline: Judge OKs Brain Tests in Reno End-Of-Life Case

docs.snippet: A Nevada judge gave a Reno hospital the go-ahead Tuesday to conduct brain wave tests on a 20-year-old woman who has been on life-support since April, but the judge indicated she won't rule until at least Jan. 22 on the crucial question of life or...

docs.lead_paragraph: DuPont will cut 1,700 jobs in its home state of Delaware and thousands more globally as it prepares for its merger with Dow Chemical.

headline.main: DuPont Moves Ahead on Job Cuts Ahead of Dow Merger
headline.print_headline: DuPont Moves Ahead on Job Cuts Ahead of Dow Merger

docs.snippet: DuPont will cut 1,700 jobs in its home state of Delaware and thousands more globally as it prepares for its merger with Dow Chemical.
